meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>image</kanji> <kanji>surface</kanji> is a <vocabulary>screen</vocabulary>. Just imagine your computer screen. There's an image on the surface, right? It just happens to move around all the time, like most images on screens these days.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
